name: Lelly's Math Place Chapter 1 (Cool Guy Teaches Math Mod)
name_original: Lelly's Math Place Chapter 1 (Cool Guy Teaches Math Mod)
description:
Story: Well crap. You lost you homework and you put it at school like a Dum Dum. And for some reason your homework looks like a screaming Kirby. But Lelly, the Math Teacher/Owner of the Math Place likes roaming the school at night so he can molest kids Find inturders, get the kirbys, don't touch Lelly (that looks wrong) then exit the school to beat the game.

To Be Contuned in Chapter 2...
